body: Haiiii! I'm CommanderDudeman, a lot of you knew me as CaptainDudeman (I got a new account so that I can apply for mod), I've been playing on Avicus for about 8 months I believe, and I love it. I rarely play any other servers. But I just recently started reading forums and I love it, but it's still kinda confusing :P So if you wanna say hi or give me tips, please do so! <3

replies.body:
Tips:
Dont spam forums,

To add a photo go to imgur.com,

Be respectful to all players and staff,

Create helpful discussions and get lots of comments,

To remove a discussion click the edit button next to the date . Then scroll to the bottom of the page then click the box saying 'archive' then click update discussion then your done ! 

Hope this has helped you to get started off on forums ! :P
replies.body_tagged:
Tips:
Dont spam forums,

To add a photo go to imgur.com,

Be respectful to all players and staff,

Create helpful discussions and get lots of comments,

To remove a discussion click the edit button next to the date . Then scroll to the bottom of the page then click the box saying 'archive' then click update discussion then your done ! 

Hope this has helped you to get started off on forums ! :P

replies.body:
Hey Captain!
If you wish to create a map for the server make sure that you have it in a void world and that it is unique! You can upload your completed map to the forums under the "Map Releases" section with a download to the map, pictures of the map and a YAML. You can visit the Avicus YAML docs to learn all about how to create YAML's!
(http://docs.avicus.net/)
If you need help with something just ask!
replies.body_tagged:
Hey Captain!
If you wish to create a map for the server make sure that you have it in a void world and that it is unique! You can upload your completed map to the forums under the "Map Releases" section with a download to the map, pictures of the map and a YAML. You can visit the Avicus YAML docs to learn all about how to create YAML's!
(http://docs.avicus.net/)
If you need help with something just ask!
